glosses: a family unit, consisting of the parents together with their children still living at their parent's home
a lot of children, a pack of children

examples.text: Pireler kanımızı emerek yaşarlar, çoluk ve çocuk yaparlar.
examples.translation: Fleas suck our blood in order to survive and reproduce.

glosses: young people with no or insufficient job training to earn a living

etymology: Sources disagree on the origin of the first word. Çağbayır derives çoluk by alteration of çocuk. Nişanyan traces it to oluk (olmak) plus alliteration.
